page.title: 16THE RECTOR OF STISTED
page.content: The Reverend George Muggleton has been Rector of Stisted for seventeen years. His parish consists of Stisted,Brad- well and Pattiswick.The church at Pattiswick became redundant and is to be sold.He holds two services most Sundays in Stisted and one in Bradwell.Congregations are very small,with the largest at about 20,and he carries out only 3 or 4 weddings and baptisms and 8 to 10 funerals each year.He does not agree with the baptism of the children of non- churchgoers.The churches are old and kept locked.Three times in the past 20 years thieves have tried to strip Stisted church roof of lead. {*}The rector teaches Church history in the local church-aided primary school (where he is Chairman of the Governors) and has the biggest Mothers'Union in the area.
